column4: :FallenHilokiri  I tried using passwd, all it does is offer to type in a new password.???

:mmkassem I changed the home directory of my administrator account by error with the gnome menu now I can't login with that account. Luckily I have another user account and would like to reset  the administrators home directory through the command line
At a command line.  usermod -d /path/to/homedir user
